line.text: But be contented when that fell arrest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Without all bail shall carry me away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My life hath in this line some interest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which for memorial still with thee shall stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When thou reviewest this thou dost review
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The very part was consecrate to thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The earth can have but earth which is his due
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My spirit is thine the better part of me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So then thou hast but lost the dregs of life
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The prey of worms my body being dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The coward conquest of a wretch knife
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Too base of thee to be remembered
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The worth of that is that which it contains
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And that is this and this with thee remains
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
